query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZPST0117L ( MANDT, PSPID , GUBUN, HKONT, SEQNO, ITEMNO, ITEMTX, UNIT, CAPA, QUAN, WRBTR, WAERS, BGOTX, POSID ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT#, #PSPID#, #GUBUN#, #HKONT#, #SEQNO#, #ITEMNO#, #ITEMTX#, #UNIT#, #CAPA#, CAST(#QUAN# AS INTEGER), #WRBTR#, #WAERS#, #BGOTX#, #POSID# )
